ygData.subject: RE: Bug warning! Angstlich's Appalling Screech
ygData.msgSnippet: Trains in Sol B?  Woohoo!  Even during primetime on Fennin Ro we get the group way back in the bugs that decides to try the Noxious Spider (aka Nox), or the
ygData.messageBody:
Trains in Sol B? Woohoo! Even during primetime on Fennin Ro we get the
group way back in the bugs that decides to try the Noxious Spider (aka Nox),
or the Stone Spider. More often than not they run for the zone in the end
with a train of Sonic Bats, Lava Beetles and Lava Duct Crawlers on their
tails. For the people that haven't been there, or that aren't yet high
enough level to fight in Sol B, this is A SINGLE FRIGGIN' SPIDER that can
send a group in their high forties running for the zone - Ice Comet just
pisses him off.

Crier

> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Trains in Sol-B?? I have been there for about a week or 2 on and off
now...
